name: Brasil
about: Brasil Everything was seamless. The private guides were interesting and knowledgeable. We felt that they were more than just guides. It was like we had a friend in each city. I cannot speak highly enough about our 3 week trip to this place and the services provided by them.

places.name: Chapada Diamantina
places.about: The Chapada Diamantina National Park is one of the most fascinating natural parks of Brazil. The mountain scenery contains an extraordinary variety of ecosystems, from the arid Cerrado to the lush Mata Atlantica to the rocky terrain of the Caatinga. The bromelia and orchids find a welcoming environment, adapting themselves to the differences in climate and altitude. The mountain reach peaks of 1725m (5660 ft), and offer shelter to the jaguatirica (local wildcat), puma, mocó (rabbit-like rodent), deer, teius (lizard) and seriema (long-legged birds).

places.history:
The Chapada Diamantina National Park was established in 1985 and is currently undergoing a process of implementation, administered by the ministry of the environment (ICMBio Instituto Chico Mendes de Conservação da Biodiversidade), based in Palmeiras. 
For security reasons and to safeguard the environment, the local guide associations in the area should be contacted prior to undertaking treks within the park. Tourist agencies, pousadas, hostels and other groups offering community hosting can all recommend trips by bike, off-road, canoe and trekking on foot, as well as on horseback. Other attractions available include new age, spiritual discovery and personal development, including past-life regression and other esoteric activities.

reviews.comment: A standout feature of Tour is its meticulous attention to detail. Each itinerary is thoughtfully planned, ensuring a perfect balance between iconic landmarks and hidden gems. The handpicked local guides possess a wealth of knowledge and provide invaluable insights into the destination's history, traditions, and lesser-known stories. Throughout my journey, Tour's impeccable planning and execution made me feel like a privileged traveler, effortlessly blending with the local culture. Flexibility and Customization this agency fully understands that

Right off the bat, I was captivated by the sleek and intuitive design of Tour. With its user-friendly interface, navigating through the vast array of destinations and itineraries is a breeze. The seamless integration of interactive maps, stunning visuals, and detailed descriptions truly brings each journey to life. Whether you're an adventure seeker or a culture enthusiast, Tour presents a wide range of customizable options tailored to suit all types of travelers.

Imagine embarking on a transformative journey that takes you to the far corners of the globe, immersing you in diverse cultures and spectacular landscapes. This is precisely what Tour offers – a gateway to unforgettable experiences, opening doors to the world's most coveted destinations. As a seasoned traveler, I was fortunate to test out Tour and unveil its true potential. In this comprehensive review, I will share my genuine thoughts and insights to help you make an informed decision about this remarkable travel companion.

places.name: Carnival in Brazil
places.about: “As she moves, she's like a samba that swings so cool and sways so gentle.” So goes the fabled bossa nova tune, “The Girl from Ipanema,” a loving ode to Rio de Janeiro’s most infamous beauty. Just like the tune’s namesake, the spirit of samba pulsates throughout the Rio Carnival. It’s a joy-filled festa that attracts two million revellers per day each year to the streets of Brazil’s most sun-kissed and storied city.

places.history: Partying is a sacred art in Brazil, and the Rio Carnival is the pinnacle of this time-honored tradition. Thrumming with the intoxicating rhythm of drums, the streets pack out for six days in a celebration of diversity. Yet more lyrics from the famed song – “tall and tan and young and lovely” – spring to mind as you observe the dancers igniting Rio’s streets. Skilled showgirls with bronzed skin and wide grins lead samba bands raucously through the city. Here no outfit is too ostentatious, and golden sequins glint in the heady sunshine.
